sentences.english: MFN clause generally applies to the substantive problem.
sentences.chinese: 最惠國待遇條款一般適用於實體問題。

sentences.english: India has already granted MFN status to Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 印度已經給予巴基斯坦最惠國待遇。

sentences.english: This country cannot have the treatment of the most-favoured-nation clause.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家不能享有最惠國條款上的待遇。

sentences.english: Both countries have also agreed to extend to each other most-favored-nation treatment for investment purposes.
sentences.chinese: 兩國也同意將最惠國待遇擴展到投資領域。

sentences.english: It grants most-favoured-nation (MFN) treatment as a minimum to all its trade partners.
sentences.chinese: 對她的貿易伙伴，多哥最起碼同意以最惠國待遇對待。

sentences.english: The U. S. will suffer most if it discontinues China's mostfavorednation status.
sentences.chinese: 取消中國的最惠國待遇，最大的受害者將是美國。

sentences.english: Charter three: reflection on application of MFN clause in investment dispute settlement.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，最惠國條款適用於投資爭端解決問題的反思。

sentences.english: What concussion can most-favoured-nation treatment principle bring to domestic economy?
sentences.chinese: 最惠國待遇原則會給國內經濟帶來哪些衝擊？
